Professor.name: 서현권 (Hyun Kwon Suh)
Professor.description: AI and Machine Learning in Agriculture: Computer Vision, Automation, Optimization

project.title: Smart Farm Platform for high-quality and traceable yield. A multi-purpose DDS based on proximal and remote sensing. (ALARAD)
project.description: To optimize the decision making process through the proximal and remote monitoring of meteorological, soil, plant and fruit identifying the critical physiological variables for health, growth and vigor in order to adapt and refine the standard cultivation techniques maximizing fruit yield, quality and food security while minimizing environmental impact and other risks.

project.title: Development of autonomus environment control platform for greenhouses using artificial intelligence
project.description: To develop an AI-based fully autonomous integrated environmental control technology for operating a smart farming, a complex environmental control platform will be created that allows cultivators to implement their desired cultivation strategies by monitoring real-time growth and environmental data.
